Class LossyWeightedCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.monnetproject.translation.langmodels.LossyWeightedCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WeightedCounter

    public class LossyWeightedCounter
extends Object
implements WeightedCounter
    As with lossy counter but counts with a different weight for each element
    Author:
    John McCrae
